title: Alternative Therapies for Children with Brain Injury & Developmental Disorders
description: Autism, Developmental Disorders, Cerebral Palsy, ADHD, Brain Injury: Our goal is to provide the most comprehensive site available for the discussion of medical and physical therapies for the treatment of brain injured children, hence creating a networking structure for parents and physicians alike.
cleaned_text: Alternative Therapies for Children with Brain Injury & Developmental Disorders Please upgrade your Netscape Navigator or Microsoft Internet Explorer browser to version 2.0 or higher to view this website. You will not be disappointed! If you are not yet using one of these two full-function browsers, isn't it time you try one out?!
